overview: Featuring amazing performances and illuminating interviews from eleven of today’s greatest drum artists, Including Thomas Pridgen, Billy Ward, Will Calhoun, Ndugu Chancler, Simon Phillips, Carmine Appice & SLAMM, Derek Roddy, Dafnis Prieto, Todd Sucherman, Gavin Harrison and Bill Stewart. Also included are 2 DVDs full of inspiring conversations with each drummer, as well as unprecedented drummer-to-drummer interviews, such as Simon Phillips-Gavin Harrison, Ndugu Chancler-Will Calhoun and Todd Sucherman-Derek Roddy, plus on-screen graphics that link the lessons to the printable eBook with transcriptions of each artist’s lessons.
title: Modern Drummer Festival 2008
